name: Criminal
description: You eked out a living in dark alleyways, cutting purses or burgling shops. Perhaps you were part of a small gang of like-minded criminals who looked out for each other, or maybe you were a lone wolf.

features.name: Alert
features.description: You add your Proficiency Bonus to Initiative rolls. You can't be Surprised while conscious. Other creatures don't gain Advantage on attack rolls against you as a result of being unseen by you.
